program.name: transfig
program.build: gmake MAKE=gmake CC="${CC:-gcc}" CDEBUGFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CCOPTIONS="" XFIGLIBDIR=${XFIG_LIB} \ XPMLIBDIR="${XPM_LIB}" XPMINC="-I${XPM_INC}" \ XPMLIBS="-L${XPM_LIB} ${CC_LD_RT}${XPM_LIB} -lXpm" \ JPEGLIBDIR="${JPEG_LIB}" JPEGINCDIR="${JPEG_INC}" \ JPEGLIB="-L${JPEG_LIB} ${CC_LD_RT}${JPEG_LIB} -ljpeg" \ PNGLIBDIR="${LIBPNG_LIB}" PNGINC="-I${LIBPNG_INC} -I${ZLIB_INC}" \ PNGLIBS="-L${LIBPNG_LIB} -L${ZLIB_LIB} ${CC_LD_RT}${LIBPNG_LIB}:\ ${ZLIB_LIB} -lpng -lz" EXTRA_LOAD_FLAGS="-lX11 ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ FIG2DEV_LIBDIR="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/fig2dev"
program.install: gmake MAKE=gmake BINDIR=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin \ MANDIR=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/man/man1 \ XFIGLIBDIR=${XFIG_LIB} \ XAPPLOADDIR=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/app-defaults \ XPMLIBDIR=${XPM_LIB} XPMINC=-I${XPM_INC} \ XPMLIBS="-L${XPM_LIB} ${CC_LD_RT}${XPM_LIB} -lXpm" \ JPEGLIBDIR=${JPEG_LIB} JPEGINCDIR="${JPEG_INC}" \ JPEGLIB="-L${JPEG_LIB} ${CC_LD_RT}${JPEG_LIB} -ljpeg" \ PNGLIBDIR="${LIBPNG_LIB}" PNGINC="-I${LIBPNG_INC} -I${ZLIB_INC}" \ PNGLIBS="-L${LIBPNG_LIB} -L${ZLIB_LIB} ${CC_LD_RT}${LIBPNG_LIB}:\ ${ZLIB_LIB} -lpng -lz" FIG2DEV_LIBDIR="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/fig2dev" \ INSTALL=ginstall MANSUFFIX=1 install install.man
